title: What number is the car hiding?
hint: Think of this from the driver point of view
explanation: The answer is 87. Flip the image to see a parking lot with the numbers: 86,__,88,89,90,91
description: In this riddle, you need to figure out what number is missing from a parking lot sequence shown in an image of a car parked in a lot.

title: My name is Railey. I changed my name to Corby. Then I changed it to John. And then I changed it to Colin and then I was called Arthur. What is my name?
hint: try thinking what is the latest name...
explanation: His name is still Railey as he starts with this statement, the rest of the names are in the past.
description: In this riddle, you need to figure out what is the name of the riddler.

title:
What is the next letter:
 S,O,E,N,S,?
hint:
try associating the first letter to the first something
second letter to the second something and so on...
explanation:
first letter of sunday(first day of the week)is-S
second letter of mOnday is-O(second day of the week)and so on...
so the answer isthe sixth letter of fridaY -Y
description: In this riddle, you need to identify a pattern

title: How many triangles in the picture?
description: In this riddle, you need to count

title:
I am an odd number.
Take away a letter and I become even.
What number am I?
hint: What number will become even after removing a letter
explanation: Removing the S from seven will get us the word even
description: In this riddle, you need to figure out what is the number
